key_talking_points: Edmonton's early penalty puts Florida on the power play with a chance to extend their one-goal lead early in the first period.
The missed shot by Edmonton could have changed the game's momentum, showing their offensive pressure.
The high-sticking penalty was committed by Brett Kulak (EDM) against Carter Verhaeghe (FLA). Kulak will serve 2 minutes.
for_commentary_agent.context: The momentum is moderate due to the missed shot and a penalty on Edmonton. The score is close, so the penalty is a key moment. Need to balance play-by-play with some analysis of the penalty and its potential impact.

high_intensity_events.summary: Missed shot by EDM hits crossbar

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Florida power play, but also highlight Edmonton's offensive zone presence. This is a close, high-scoring game, so any momentum swing can be crucial.
